creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Still life showing bust of Francis I of Este with attributes armor, a globe, gloves, a silver platter, a bird and an astrolabe. Unsigned.
markings: Labels in object file:  (Carnegie Institute typed exh. label) | (2 MIA labels: OG48.221 lent to U of M; OG51.211 to Carnegie Institute) | (small red label with 8424 written in pen)
title: Allegorical Still Life with Bernini's Bust of Duke Francesco I d'Este
